definitions.definition: A methodology and activities associated with running a government , an organization, or a movement.
The profession of conducting political affairs.
examples: He made a career out of politics .
Their politics are clear from the bumper stickers on their cars.

definitions.definition: Political maneuvers or diplomacy between people, groups, or organizations, especially involving power, standing, influence or conflict.
Real-world beliefs and social issues irrelevant to the topic at hand .
examples: We're trying to talk about comic books, don't mention politics .

main_definition: ( countable ) A methodology and activities associated with running a government , an organization, or a movement.
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) The profession of conducting political affairs.
( treated as a plural noun ) One's political stands and opinions.
( uncountable ) Political maneuvers or diplomacy between people, groups, or organizations, especially involving power, standing, influence or conflict.
( in the singular , informal ) Real-world beliefs and social issues irrelevant to the topic at hand .
